properties.alt: Picture of a videoprojection on the 26th of April
properties.title: Picture of a videoprojection on the 26th of April
properties.style: width:100%;height:100%;margin:0;vertical-align:middle;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;

children.value: During lockdown in France I designed a decentralised videoprojection installation to bring art at the doorstep of residential areas. People all over France were able to exhibit
from their window without prior knowledge in videomapping.
Drawings traveled between locations connecting people and creating a
collective artwork evolving with upcoming drawings
. During the French lockdown, more than
